TypeSignature.Value: .class public auto ansi beforefieldinit DomainController extends System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.DirectoryServer

summary.span: 類別表示 Active Directory 網域中的網域控制站。

span.span: The class represents a domain controller in an Active Directory domain.

summary.span: 使用知識一致性檢查程式 (KCC) 來驗證此網域控制站的複寫拓撲。

span.span: Uses the Knowledge Consistency Checker (KCC) to verify the replication topology for this domain controller.

summary.span: 讓此物件釋放所有 Managed 和 (或) Unmanaged 資源。

span.span: Causes the object to release all managed and/or unmanaged resources.

remarks.format: ## Remarks `disposing`參數會影響受管理資源的版本。The `disposing` parameter affects only the release of the managed resources. 這個方法一律會釋出 unmanaged 的資源。The unmanaged resources are always released by this method.

MemberSignature.Value: .method public hidebysig instance void SeizeRoleOwnership(valuetype System.DirectoryServices.ActiveDirectory.ActiveDirectoryRole role) cil managed

param.name: role
param.span: 其中一個 成員，可指定網域控制站應該取得哪一個角色的擁有權。

span.span: One of the members that specifies which role the domain controller should take ownership of.

summary.span: 讓此網域控制站取得指定之角色的擁有權。

span.span: Causes this domain controller to take ownership of the specified role.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 這個方法是破壞性作業，因為這會導致目前擁有此角色的伺服器之間合作關係沒有要採取的角色。This method is a destructive operation because it causes the role to be taken without the cooperation of the server that currently holds the role. 盡可能方法也應該改為使用。The method should be used instead whenever possible.

span.span: is not valid.
The current object has been disposed.

public: override void SyncReplicaFromAllServers(System::String ^ partition, System::DirectoryServices::ActiveDirectory::SyncFromAllServersOptions options);

param.name: partition
param.span: 要同步處理的網域控制站之磁碟分割的辨別名稱。

span.span: The distinguished name of the partition for the domain controller to synchronize.

param.name: options
param.span: 一或多個 成員的組合。

span.span: A combination of one or more of the members.

summary.span: 讓此網域控制站將指定之磁碟分割與所有其他網域控制站同步。

span.span: Causes this domain controller to synchronize the specified partition with all other domain controllers.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 根據預設，複寫才會發生相同的站台的其他網域控制站。By default, the replication will only occur with the other domain controllers in the same site. 如果`options`參數包含值，樹系中的所有網域控制站將會都進行複寫。If the `options` parameter contains the value, then the replication will occur with all domain controllers in the forest.

span.span: is .
is not valid.
The current object has been disposed.

exception.span: 同步處理作業中發生了錯誤。

span.span: An error occurred in the synchronization operation.
